inclusion.criterion: age > 18 years old and life expectancy > 8 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate liver function (SGOT and bilirubin < 2 times ULN)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate renal function (creatinine < 1.5 mg/dL and/or creatinine clearance > 60 cc/min)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: radiographic evidence for tumor progression by MRI or CT scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recent resection of recurrent or progressive tumor
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: prior therapy that included interstitial brachytherapy or stereotactic radiosurgery with confirmation of true progressive disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: women of childbearing potential with negative ß-HCG pregnancy test documented within 14 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: significant medical illnesses that cannot be adequately controlled
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: history of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix) unless in complete remission and off of all therapy for that disease for a minimum of 3 years
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: active infection or serious intercurrent medical illness
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: pregnant/breast feeding and not agreeing to practice adequate contraception
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: disease that will obscure toxicity or dangerously alter drug metabolism
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation therapy. However, the patient's current condition is not explicitly stated as being controlled or stable.
